issue.title: [Documentation] Add note about deviation from style guide on struct/classes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12000](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12000). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Per [mailing list discussion](https://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/arrow-dev/202103.mbox/%3CCAE4AYb06esU2onU42SpoA-oK0tFaM5AjTni7-4SwPq13pF70ag%40mail.gmail.com%3E) there are places where we use structs that wouldn't technically be allowed by the Google style guide.  We should add a small note to our development guidelines stating as much.
